variable.name: clinic
variable.description: A1. Identifying information: de-identified EDIC clinic number

variable.name: form
variable.description: EDIC form number

variable.name: fsasdate
variable.description: A4. Identifying information. De-identified form date

variable.name: mask_pat
variable.description: A2. Identifying information. De-identified patient ID

variable.name: odb1

variable.name: odb1a1

variable.description: B1. Current medication: if the patient uses no other prescription or non-prescription medication check here and STOP.

variable.name: odb5a

variable.name: odb5a2
